title: (懷舊) 史高斯應該係近30年最佳中場？

replies.msg:
睇下名宿點講: https://en.wikiquote.org/wiki/Paul_Scholes

部份節錄如下

"Everyone of us should emulate him. We can all learn from Paul Scholes." [16]
Edgar Davids

"My toughest opponent? Scholes of Manchester. He is the complete midfielder. Scholes is undoubtedly the greatest midfielder of his generation." [17]
Zinedine Zidane

"Paul Scholes would have been one of my first choices for putting together a great team – that goes to show how highly I have always rated him. An all-round midfielder who possesses quality and character in abundance." [18]
Marcello Lippi

"Without any doubt the best player in the Premiership has to be Scholes. He knows how to do everything, and he is one who directs the way his team plays. On top of that, he has indestructible mental strength and he is a genuine competitor." [19]
Thierry Henry

"I am a big admirer of Paul Scholes, he is one of the best players of his generation and I honestly think [Wesley] Sneijder is the only player in the world capable of replacing him." [23]
Arjen Robben

"“Why isn’t he playing for England? It is crazy. Only in England. Scholes is a great, great player. So experienced and still, for me, one of the best in the world in midfield. Manchester United are lucky to have him.” [26]
Jose Mourinho

"I’ve still got Paul Scholes’ shirt at home which I swapped with him once. When I was at Liverpool he was one of the players I liked most. Maybe he’s not valued as much as he should be in England because of the style of football there and because he keeps a low profile. Perhaps he would have been more valued in Spain, where midfielders like him form part of the ‘ideal.’ Fans in Spain rate him very highly and I admire him a huge amount." [27]
Xabi Alonso

"Paul Scholes is a role model. For me – and I really mean this – he's the best central midfielder I've seen in the last 15, 20 years. I've spoken to Xabi Alonso about him. He's spectacular, he has it all: the last pass, goals, he's strong, he doesn't lose the ball, vision. If he'd been Spanish he might have been rated more highly. Players love him." [33]
Xavi Hernández

"“For any football player in the Premiership, Scholes is a player you want to emulate. One player does not make a team but there is no doubt that the presence of some players add extra motivation and confidence. Scholes is a player with character and is capable of transmitting that mental strength to his team-mates." [35]
Cesc Fabregas

“At La Masia (Barcelona’s Academy) his name was mentioned a lot. He’s a teacher.” [38]
Lionel Messi

“If he was playing with me, I would score so many more.” [39]
Pele

“Out of everyone at Manchester United, I would pick out Scholes – he is the best midfielder of his generation. I would have loved to have played alongside him.” [40]
Pep Guardiola

“I want to pass like him. Who taught him how to do that?” [41]
Ronaldinho

“Scholes is the best i’ve played with and he helped me a lot when I was young. He’s amazing.” [42]
Cristiano Ronaldo

“His technique is unique.”[43]
Diego Maradona

“The only great English midfielder in my career was Paul Scholes. He has elegance in him. Others were pretenders.”
Andrea Pirlo

"They have two of the world’s best young players in Cristiano Ronaldo and Wayne Rooney, but the player who most impresses me is Paul Scholes. He is United’s most important player, he makes most things happen on the field.” [63]
Andriy Shevchenko
返三十年曼聯最佳中場都未必係佢啦

"United always had many amazing players, but whenever we faced them we were always, always, always scared of what Paul Scholes could do. Ask anyone from that old Arsenal team, they will tell you the same. If you let him play, he can kill you, and for me he was so underrated. The way he plays: one touch, arriving late into the box, the way he strikes the ball, his vision, his passing. Incredible. I know people used to give him some stick for his tackling, but I liked that. He put his foot in, showed some character, had a go, but I liked that about him too. For me he is one of the best midfielders I have ever seen." [57]
Thierry Henry

replies.msg:
https://en.m.wikiquote.org/wiki/Steven_Gerrard

美斯都讚過謝拉特係England’s greatest ever player
但佢只係話巴塞academy成日提scholes 話scholes係teacher


細哨話Cristiano is a great player. But Steven Gerrard is, for me, one of the very best in the world. For the job he performs, for me, he is one of the greatest
kaka話For me, and I have always said this, he will be regarded as one of the greatest midfielders ever when he finishes his career. No doubt.

"If I had to choose three, I would pick Cristiano Ronaldo, because of his skill and speed; Messi, because of his flair and skills; and Steven Gerrard, who for me is the complete modern player."
totti話best English player faced during your career. I'd put him in the top three, not just in England but in the world because he's a complete player.
韋拉話"The best midfielder I would say is Steven Gerrard. I really rate him as a player and as a man."
zidane話“I have said in the past that at his peak he was the best in the world”
Is he the best in the world? He might not get the attention of (Lionel) Messi and Ronaldo but yes, I think he just might be.
比利話"For me, for the last five years Gerrard has been the best player in the world. "He is a midfielder, he plays very good. People didn't mention Gerrard, now they mention Ronaldinho, Ronaldo, Messi because they are forwards."

先唔講xavi小白zidane啲變態佬
淨係睇英人
其實gerrard評價唔會差得過scholes
全盛期係俾啲名宿regard as best player
俾細哨 zidane 卡卡 比利 拎嚟同c7 美斯比較

根本話史高斯勁啲的人，都未睇過美斯全盛嗰陣有幾恐怖

拿
講明先
真心覺得史高斯好勁
佢係條命衰
衰在佢同呢個痴線佬一樣踢中場

睇下呢兩條片就知有幾癲
（兩條都係一場波入面的精華，睇全季集錦無意思，個個都係球王）

http://youtu.be/Isx8srxCgQQ
http://youtu.be/u9EaP96QsAA


有時真係唔係話史高斯差
但足球真係要成場睇
剩睇數據其實真係唔準

呢兩場波美斯都唔係入十幾廿球個種
但你睇下佢次拎波
對對手造成的威脅有幾大
人地要花幾多人去阻止佢
就知有幾恐怖
比人感覺真係一個人屌打人地全隊

史高斯勁個陣係腳風好 入一兩球
睇比數會覺得佢一個人帶領球隊贏波
但佢入波集中係反擊/遠射/死球
全部都係要成隊波造出黎
問心如果佢係一隊弱隊踢
究竟仲可唔可以有咁多射門機會？

美斯勁係勁在
就算踢史篤城
都可以吸引3/4個人埋黎逼佢
一係佢就過撚哂你
一係佢就用創造出黎的空位交波比人


最後就係對足球的理解
史高斯個種其實係運動員的典範
將每種物理上的可能加到最高
無人會否認佢係出色的足球員
因為佢送到個波入網
但睇佢踢波
你係唔會對足球加深左理解

相反睇美斯/小白/沙維/布斯基斯踢波
你真係會覺得佢地用緊個腦踢波
每一個動作都係有作用
唔會插完花 又回後
或者一味trial and error 式的浪射

如果朗癲係你最估佢唔到的球員
美斯應該係集足球智慧同技術於一體的典範
你望住佢
明知佢過你 你連拉都拉唔住 鏟跌佢 又企返起身
明知佢會傳 你估佢冇咁準會傳到 佢又真係傳到
明知佢會射 封哂位 佢都可以射埋你大細

科學家已經研究過
美斯大腦的運動反射神經係萬中無一
先可以係極短時間內做正確的決定同動作

有人話
係巴塞勁 先令到美斯勁

其實係岩岩相反
成套傳控足球的核心就係做突破缺口的美斯
沙維小白係好重要
但足球最終都係要得分
一咪傳控係贏唔到比賽（2014西班牙就係咁）
數據上都反映到（助攻美斯最多的唔係沙維小白，反而係後上側擊的丹尼爾）

當然你可以話好鍾意睇充滿力量 速度的足球
但從古到今
最為後人所讚頌的
都係有足球智慧的球員
因為體能會隨狀態而消逝
唯獨技術同智慧先係歷久不衰

quote.msg:
最尾嗰句幾同意，所以我都講左，踢強隊同非強隊唔同

Scholes係xavi, pirlo嗰種，低調英雄，閱讀球賽及控制節奏能力極高，依種球員往往被忽視，但其賽好難得
真係踢到最佳就唔會俾人忽視喇，又唔見沙維、小白、派路俾人忽視？

"I’ve still got Paul Scholes’ shirt at home which I swapped with him once. When I was at Liverpool he was one of the players I liked most. Maybe he’s not valued as much as he should be in England because of the style of football there and because he keeps a low profile. Perhaps he would have been more valued in Spain, where midfielders like him form part of the ‘ideal.’ Fans in Spain rate him very highly and I admire him a huge amount." [27]
Xabi Alonso

"Paul Scholes is a role model. For me – and I really mean this – he's the best central midfielder I've seen in the last 15, 20 years. I've spoken to Xabi Alonso about him. He's spectacular, he has it all: the last pass, goals, he's strong, he doesn't lose the ball, vision. If he'd been Spanish he might have been rated more highly. Players love him." [33]
Xavi Hernández

睇比數會覺得佢一個人帶領球隊贏波
但佢入波集中係反擊/遠射/死球
全部都係要成隊波造出黎
問心如果佢係一隊弱隊踢
究竟仲可唔可以有咁多射門機會？

美斯勁係勁在
就算踢史篤城
都可以吸引3/4個人埋黎逼佢
一係佢就過撚哂你
一係佢就用創造出黎的空位交波比人


最後就係對足球的理解
史高斯個種其實係運動員的典範
將每種物理上的可能加到最高
無人會否認佢係出色的足球員
因為佢送到個波入網
但睇佢踢波
你係唔會對足球加深左理解

相反睇美斯/小白/沙維/布斯基斯踢波
你真係會覺得佢地用緊個腦踢波
每一個動作都係有作用
唔會插完花 又回後
或者一味trial and error 式的浪射

如果朗癲係你最估佢唔到的球員
美斯應該係集足球智慧同技術於一體的典範
你望住佢
明知佢過你 你連拉都拉唔住 鏟跌佢 又企返起身
明知佢會傳 你估佢冇咁準會傳到 佢又真係傳到
明知佢會射 封哂位 佢都可以射埋你大細

科學家已經研究過
美斯大腦的運動反射神經係萬中無一
先可以係極短時間內做正確的決定同動作

有人話
係巴塞勁 先令到美斯勁

其實係岩岩相反
成套傳控足球的核心就係做突破缺口的美斯
沙維小白係好重要
但足球最終都係要得分
一咪傳控係贏唔到比賽（2014西班牙就係咁）
數據上都反映到（助攻美斯最多的唔係沙維小白，反而係後上側擊的丹尼爾）

當然你可以話好鍾意睇充滿力量 速度的足球
但從古到今
最為後人所讚頌的
都係有足球智慧的球員
因為體能會隨狀態而消逝
唯獨技術同智慧先係歷久不衰

試下分析史高斯既實力
---------------------------------
(1) Long passes
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aBr92RgT7LA

“If he was playing with me, I would score so many more.” [39]
Pele

Ronaldinho

Cristiano Ronaldo:
“When we were in training, I used to do a lot of tricks which hardly any players at the club could do. Once I was showing my skills to Scholes. After I finished it, Scholes took the ball and pointed to a tree which was about 50m from where we were standing. He said, I’m going to hit it in one shot. He kicked and hit the tree. He asked me to do the same; I kicked about 10 times, but still couldn’t hit it, with that accuracy. Scholes is the best i’ve played with and he helped me a lot when I was young.

---------------------------------
(2) 全能到仆街

Zidane:
'Scholes is undoubtedly the greatest midfielder of his generation. You rarely come across the complete footballer, but Scholes is as close to it as you can get. One of my regrets is that the opportunity to play alongside him never presented itself during my career.'

Xavi:
For me – and I really mean this – he's the best central midfielder I've seen in the last 15, 20 years. He's spectacular, he has it all: the last pass, goals, he's strong, he doesn't lose the ball, vision. If he'd been Spanish he might have been rated more highly.

---------------------------------
(3) Dictate Tempo

"The only great English midfielder in my career was Paul Scholes. He has elegance in him. Others were pretenders. Didn’t just play the game, he thought about the game. You could see every pass, every decision, was based on his intelligence and understanding.
Andrea Pirlo
